description: This file defines a React functional component 'HelloWorld' for a Remotion video project. It imports various Remotion components and helpers, as well as other internal components like Logo, Title, Subtitle, and uses the 'zod' library for schema validation. The component animates logo translation, fade-out, and sequences of titles/subtitles.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React functional component rendering animated video content with logo and texts, using Remotion's animation hooks.
